unnormalised: **Scholarship Portals: Your Ticket to a Brighter Future!**
normalised: Scholarship Portals: Your Ticket to a Brighter Future!

unnormalised: Hey students! Juggling studies and worrying about fees? Relax! Scholarship portals are becoming a total game-changer in EdTech, making finding funding way easier than asking your Sharma uncle for pocket money.
normalised: Hey students! Juggling studies and worrying about fees? Relax! Scholarship portals are becoming a total game-changer in EdTech, making finding funding way easier than asking your Sharma uncle for pocket money.

unnormalised: Think of them like online treasure maps pointing to scholarships! Forget endless paper applications and confusing websites. These portals, like the "Vidya Dhan" and others, are central hubs listing tons of opportunities, from engineering courses at IIT Madras to arts scholarships for promising Kathak dancers.
normalised: Think of them like online treasure maps pointing to scholarships! Forget endless paper applications and confusing websites. These portals, like the "Vidya Dhan" and others, are central hubs listing tons of opportunities, from engineering courses at I I T Madras to arts scholarships for promising Kathak dancers.

unnormalised: Many even personalize suggestions based on your marks and interests - like a smart biryani chef choosing the perfect spices for your taste!
normalised: Many even personalize suggestions based on your marks and interests - like a smart biryani chef choosing the perfect spices for your taste!

unnormalised: This Onam season, why not treat yourself to a scholarship? Sites are constantly updated with new opportunities, so keep checking. Don't miss out! It could mean the difference between stressing about Rs. 50,000 in tuition fees and landing your dream internship in Bangalore. So, ditch the chai break for a few minutes and explore those portals! Your education is worth it!
normalised: This Onam season, why not treat yourself to a scholarship? Sites are constantly updated with new opportunities, so keep checking. Don't miss out! It could mean the difference between stressing about rupee fifty thousand in tuition fees and landing your dream internship in Bangalore. So, ditch the chai break for a few minutes and explore those portals! Your education is worth it!
